Text:
STOP uploading TV episodes to the Other Other category.
TV episodes belong in the Video TV show category.

If you keep on uploading every torrent to the wrong category, forcing the TPB staff to move them, we will have to consider closing your account until you smarten up.

Come on people, seed! It's not hard. At least wait a few days before you delete the torrent. I've been trying to download for ages, but it's extremely, frustratingly slow.

Other than that, this is a good torrent. Well done!
